EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum heat value in the heatmap?
EVJ.A: The global maximum heat value is {0.53}.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum heat value in the heatmap?
EVJ.A: The global minimum heat value is {0.48}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum heat value for label Logistics on the y-axis?
EVJ.A: The maximum heat value for Logistics on the y-axis is {0.53}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum heat value for label Inventory on the y-axis?
EVJ.A: The maximum heat value for Inventory on the y-axis is {0.52}.

SC.Q: What is the average heat value for label Sports on the x-axis?
SC.A: The average heat value for Sports on the x-axis is {0.51}.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Beauty and Customer Service or the cell corresponding to Apparel and Inventory?
Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Groceries and Inventory or the cell corresponding to Pet Supplies and Marketing?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Groceries} and {Inventory} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Toys and Logistics or the cell corresponding to Furniture and Subscription?
Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Sports and Customer Service or the cell corresponding to Electronics and Marketplace?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Sports} and {Customer Service} has a higher heat value.
